page.title: 04HEALTH CARE IN ST.NINIANS.
page.content: In the St.Ninians area there are {doctor's surgeries}situated near most homes. Most people are treated on the National Health but you can also be treated privately. Also in this area we have{chiropodists}and{orthidontists who sometimes come to the school.There are 3 orthidontists in our area -20% of the people treated are adults. {Stirling Royal}is the only General Hospital in the St. Ninians area. It covers 5 acres and has 400 beds. There is a Nursing Home,Maternity Unit and a Childrens Ward where relatives can sleep. The{Maternity Unit}is new and the surgical block is being completed now, 1985. It has lots of the latest technological equipment and 7 operating theatres. There are special doctor's houses nearby for them to live in. (G.Hehir)
